attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW to ensure that the Human Rights Act enacted in this country only applies to foreigners who are in this country, when those foreigners are from a country which has an identical Human Rights Act in force in that country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is wrong that people can arrive in this country and claim AND BE GRANTED! protection under our Human Rights Act when there is no such protection for them in their home country.  Foreigner arrivals in this country KNOW this and that is exactly why they continue to conduct their nefarious and criminal activities because they KNOW that our unjust law system favours them over the indigenous population.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
